activities: Scout Analytics collects data both directly from a website owner, and from a control placed on a client’s website to monitor, analyze, and aggregate data.  This data is provided back to the website owner through a secured portal.
contactoff1: Scout Analytics   1180 NW Maple Street, Ste. 330  Issaquah WA 98027
personaldata: Organization, Pricing, Licensing, Client, and Client Assignment Information.  Data is sent electronically, however, may be manually manipulated to correct errors.
privacyprograms: Scout Analytics conducts both internal reviews and performs periodic audits of its privacy and security policies.  However, Scout Analytics is not a member of any privacy programs related to to the Safe Harbor progam.
